channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Second post
item.description: This quick start uses macOS in the examples. For instructions about how to install Hugo on other operating systems, see install. It is recommended to have Git installed to run this tutorial. For other approaches learning Hugo like book or a video tutorial refer to the external learning resources page.
